channel.title: Start (skills)?
channel.description:
Hello, when I make a new account on my server I start with 14 hp (combat level 4). Can anyone tell me where and how I change so it starts with 10 out of 10 hp? Atm 99 out of 14.. Annoying.
Thanks ~ Extoz.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2008, 07:37:07 am[/size][hr]... Anyone?

item.title: Start (skills)?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Player.java -> SEARCH:

for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) {

You’ll see:

if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 1155; currentHealth = 10; maxHealth = 10;

If “Level = 3”, (You might see 4), the player level 10 (10 = hitpoints) set its EXP to 1155, and then current health will be 10 out of 10.
Replace it with mine.

Read full topic
